desc.en: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.jp: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.zh_cn: {cn玄龙门}的运行部长{cf美奈}为了维持{sn山海经}的治安，总是不分昼夜地努力。虽然是值得视为模范的行为，但行为本身似乎又反映出某种独特的偏好。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 电影鉴赏（冷硬派系为主）

desc.en: Rumi visits Schale seeking help and, after observing Sensei for a day, becomes very upset at Sensei's irregular eating habits.
desc.jp: Rumi visits Schale seeking help and, after observing Sensei for a day, becomes very upset at Sensei's irregular eating habits.
desc.zh_cn: {cf瑠美}因为有个人的事情需要帮忙而拜访{et夏莱}。在等待问题解决的时候，{cf瑠美}观察了老师一整天，对于老师不规律的饮食习惯感到非常生气。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: After work, Sensei visits the Black Tortoise Promenade and is about to receive Rumi's "Chef's Recommended Menu" when an unwelcome guest makes their entrance.
desc.jp: After work, Sensei visits the Black Tortoise Promenade and is about to receive Rumi's "Chef's Recommended Menu" when an unwelcome guest makes their entrance.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在工作结束后拜访{cn玄武商会}。正要接受{cf瑠美}招待「主厨推荐菜单」的时候，出现了不受欢迎的无赖客人。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 為了防禦山海經，梅花園、鍊丹術研究會和玄武商會全都出動了。開始行動的玄龍門的門主妃姬會長為了給予協助，於是便派遣美奈前往。
desc.jp: 為了防禦山海經，梅花園、鍊丹術研究會和玄武商會全都出動了。開始行動的玄龍門的門主妃姬會長為了給予協助，於是便派遣美奈前往。
desc.zh_cn: 为了防御{sn山海经}，{cn梅花园}、{cn炼丹术研究会}和{cn玄武商会}全都出动了。开始行动的{cn玄龙门}的门主妃姬会长为了给予协助，于是便派遣{cf美奈}前往。

desc.en: 鍊丹術研究會、梅花園、玄武門商會都派遣了隊伍進行支援。
desc.jp: 鍊丹術研究會、梅花園、玄武門商會都派遣了隊伍進行支援。
desc.zh_cn: {cn炼丹术研究会}、{cn梅花园}、玄武门商会都派遣了队伍进行支援。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Sensei visits Genryumon to find a solution for the "10,000-year-old Ginseng controversy" surrounding the Black Tortoise Promenade. However, evidence is presented against the Black Tortoise Promenade, and everyone puts their heads together to solve the problem.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Genryumon to find a solution for the "10,000-year-old Ginseng controversy" surrounding the Black Tortoise Promenade. However, evidence is presented against the Black Tortoise Promenade, and everyone puts their heads together to solve the problem.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为了解决围绕着{cn玄武商会}发生的「万年参争议」拜访{cn玄龙门}。不过随着对{cn玄武商会}不利的证据浮上台面，大家为了解决难题一起集思广益。

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.zh_cn:
重视传统的{cn玄龙门}与尊崇进化的{cn玄武商会}。
彼此相反的{sn山海经}两大派系维持着危险的平衡。
某天，{cn玄武商会}被加诸了莫须有的怀疑──
究竟一行人能否克服这个危机呢？
